No, save yourself. Run. Avoid the Spanish department at all costs. I don't mean this to disparage the faculty. The professors I've had have been great. But with the average Yale student's busy schedule, grade expectations, and opportunities to support further study, taking Spanish at Yale is a huge mistake. It will unnecessarily sap tremendous amounts of your time. It will still sink your GPA. Several students dropped this course halfway through, causing them to lose their L1 credit from last semester, just to avoid the abyss this course would create in their lives and on their transcripts. Do yourself several favors and just take one of the obscure, easy languages.
